Santa's sleigh will not fly, but by adopting and loving this virtual reindeer pet, you can help create the Christmas magic that will help SantaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sleigh lift off the ground on Christmas Eve! Use this app to do your part to help SantaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sleigh fly! 

The Elf PetsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ Reindeer App's VIRTUAL CARE ACTIVITIES: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ FEEDÃ¢â‚¬â€Make sure your growing reindeer has all the nutrition it needs to be strong enough to pull Santa's sleigh. Drag food items to your reindeer's mouth and watch it eat. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ WASHÃ¢â‚¬â€The reindeer have been training hard, and have gotten a little dirty. Make sure your Elf PetsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ Reindeer is sparkling clean by swiping the sponge back and forth to wash them. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ LOVEÃ¢â‚¬â€Watch the love meter increase each time you pet your beloved reindeer, and you'll see your reindeer's expressions change to match! 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ RESTÃ¢â‚¬â€After training hard with Santa, your reindeer needs to rest. Turn off the lights, cover your reindeer with a blanket and watch as your tired little reindeer rests up for another big day. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ PLAYÃ¢â‚¬â€The elves love a good game! Play in two different ways: Visit the reindeer stables and figure out where each stable object goes by dragging it to the matching shape, or help the scout elves sort the reindeer food! 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ CARE BADGESÃ¢â€žÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Earn badges for continually taking care of your Elf PetsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ Reindeer to help it grow big and strong for SantaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Christmas Eve flight! Whether it's the Beginner Feeding Badge, or the Master Washing Badge, each and every badge adds Christmas spirit to the Christmas Magic MeterÃ¢â€žÂ¢. Once the meter fills to 100%, you've contributed enough to help Santa's sleigh soar!
